surfit variables
[Tcl commands and variables reference]


Modules

group  surfit data variables
group  surfit variables for OpenGL drawing

Variables

SURFIT_EXPORT REAL surfit::undef_value
 value to interprete as undefined
SURFIT_EXPORT float surfit::tol
 use this variable to manage tolerance of iterative linear system solver algorithm. If this value is too big, iterative algorithm will make low number of iterations. It leads to rought result.
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::datafile_mode
 datafile mode ( 0 - always append file, 1 - rewrite file )
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::priority
 all loaded data will have this value as priority
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::solver_code
 identifies solver for system's of linear equations Ax=b. Avaliable are:
SURFIT_EXPORT REAL surfit::sor_omega
 parameter for SOR method
SURFIT_EXPORT REAL surfit::ssor_omega
 parameter for SSOR method
SURFIT_EXPORT bool surfit::write_mat
 if write_mat=1, then surfit dumps matrices to file surfit.mat
SURFIT_EXPORT char * surfit::map_name
 this name prints in solve procedure

Variable Documentation

surfit::solver_code
 

0 - CG (Conjugate gradient) - default
1 - CG2 (Conjugate gradient for A'Ax=A'b)
2 - SIMPITER (Richardson iterations)
3 - SIMPITER2 (Richardson iterations for A'Ax=A'b)
4 - SOR (Successive OverRelaxation method, see sor_omega) 5 - SSOR (Symmetric Successive OverRelaxation method, see ssor_omega)


surfit-1.0.0pre
